name: Coup d'Etat Mastermind, Shion
text: You may look at the top card of your main deck at any time. When this card enters your field, reveal the top card of your main deck. If it's a resonator with total cost 5 or less, put it into your field. Otherwise, put it into your hand. God's Art [Serenade of Rebellion] : This card gains [+500/+500] until end of turn. Then it deals damage equal to its ATK to target J/resonator your opponent controls (Play God's Art [Serenade of Rebellion] only once per game.)
